ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Bottom half of song (minor spoiler)
ygData.msgSnippet: I didn t read all the posts to this thread, so I apologize if this has been suggested. Unless they ve changed the way Maligar works, if you re 50+ (probably
ygData.messageBody:
I didn't read all the posts to this thread, so I apologize if this has been suggested.

Unless they've changed the way Maligar works, if you're 50+ (probably much lower even), you can pull all his guards single without harmony, without lull, without even worrying about it. Get on the perimeter, move up slowly until your spell/arrow/whatever can go off and hit the guard. he comes running, you kill him. Repeat until Maligar is solo.

Darkfox
----- Original Message -----
From: Matt DeBarger
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Friday, February 23, 2001 9:56 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Bottom half of song (minor spoiler)


Well Illusion Dark Elf (I am a worshipper of Erollsi Marr if that
matters)didn't work, so I will have to get a group (need them anyway for
Doppelganger, so no big deal) then either try to sneak up on him or charm
him. Our plan is to harmony him and pull the rest away for their funerals.
Then he will be left alone without waiting for respawn...

Elfson Allegro 51(longest blue bubble ever...) Veeshan
